title: Definition of a sample
text: The sample of study is a subset of the population (essentially, a part of the population) that is actually used to conduct the sample.

title: Identifying sample
text: What is a subset of the population found in the first step that we can use to include in the study? Is it ALL the students who graduated last year, ONE student who graduated last year, or a GROUP of a students who graduated last year randomly selected?
